game.name: Two Worlds Soundtrack by Harold Faltermayer
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Trading Cards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The official “Two Worlds” album presents the stirring music from the RPG - including the title song “Play the Game”, sung by the charismatic voice of Kyra - and you get various remix versions too. Composed by the famous Harold Faltermeyer and played by the musicians of the MGM Grand Orchestra, this
